d2_create_config.title: Defines the document types (artifacts) that can be created by members of the cross-functional Product Management group. These users can create Medical Device Registration Forms containing device-related information that can be inherited by documents.
d2_create_config.application_names: OpenText Life Sciences Quality and Manufacturing Solution¬OpenText Life Sciences Medical Device for Quality and Manufacturing Solution¬OpenText Life Sciences Submission Storage and Viewing¬OpenText Life Sciences Medical Device Solution¬OpenText Life Sciences Medical Device for Research and Development Solution¬OpenText Life Sciences Research and Development Solution

row.default_value: Medical Device Registration Form Default Values
